rows.business_item_short_description: Advertising placements sold on the family of apps to marketers.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Family of Apps segment primarily generates revenue by selling advertising placements on its family of apps to marketers. These ads enable marketers to reach people across various marketing objectives such as generating leads or driving awareness.
rows.evidence_span: The Family of Apps segment primarily generates revenue by selling advertising placements on its family of apps to marketers.
